textDocument.text:
L 1,1


* BASIC INSTRUCTIONS
 LR 1,1 This is highlighted as a remark

* When the debugging session stops at a macro call,
* we can step into the macro or step over it.

* DEMOMACRO 'p

 MAC asd
 
* COPY COPYFILE


 AIF ('&SYSPARM' EQ 'STH').HERE
      nonexistent_instruction
* Here the AIF skips the J instruction.
.HERE ANOP



 AIF (&AG).HH

A EQU 10,2,C'P'
B EQU 15

C DC ADL8(1+1)

&V SETC 'DACO'
&V EQU 1 
   LR DACO,DACO

&VARP(30) SETA A,456,48,7

&VARP(31+L'C) SETA 45
D EQU                                                                 1X3145
IIIIIIIIIIIIIII1

 
&VAR SETA 10
* CODE GENERATION 
*      AIF  (&VAR EQ 10).HERE
*      asdjhasdahsjdbjahsdbjahsdb
* Here the AIF skips the J instruction.


 AMODE 64
 
&z seta 1
 UNPK 24(9,2),256(8,2)
RELOC LR 1,1

&AH SETA 1
    AIF (&VAR EQ 4).STH comment


  DC S(1(X),X)
X EQU 1
